name: Harbor City Quarter
role_in_state: Primary port, shipbuilding and reagent trade hub
economy_niches: storage and re-export of ritual reagents
culture_adjustments: apprenticeship hierarchy stronger than rural kin ties
oral navigational songs maintained as commercial charts
stricter seasonal voyage taboos enforced by guild councils
practical fusion of merchant liturgies into daily trade rites
constraints: guild monopoly on slips and drydocks
ritual reagents subject to heavy inspection and tariffs
notes: maintains registry of chart-keepers and lead pilots
port duties and reagent tariffs are major revenue source
seasonal partial closures during storm season
